name: AxeFlip
description:
John has always dreamed to put his past aside and tried to get redeemed of his fears and mistakes that kept him haunting, until one day he falls into this mystic world filled with the deepest fears of this past and future.He is left with an Axe that is the reflection of rage and pain by "The Spartan God",use this to help him find the redemption he always seeked and turn him into the man he always dreamed of.

-Remember the Axe can never leave you alone RECALL it anytime 

-Sharpen your Marksmanship skills to over come your fears of missing anything

-Push through the demons that have feared you all along


Also supports DualShock4 :
L2 - Aim Axe
L2 + R2 - Throw Axe
Triangle - Recall Axe
